评论概述: No the most flattering for curvier woman
评论详情: I have a “pear shape” body type. Being curvier on the bottom, I felt like a round pumpkin when I saw myself in the mirror. The material does not flow on your body at all. It’s more of a tutu (tulle) material. So it just kind of stays aired out. It’s not cute if you don’t want to look like you  are holding extra weight.
Overall the fabric and the color are very pretty. It is very lightweight, the only thing is that it gets itchy inside after awhile. It fits perfectly otherwise.

The style and puffiness of the dress was a lot more dramatic that advertised. the proportions were off as well. the chest area was too large but the sleeves too short and the material and coloring was not right. It looked cheap and like a dress you would but on a little girl for easter.
Not worth it.

Fabric is a little thinner than I expected. The seams were a little itchy. I’m 5’2 and pregnant and needed a dress for a party. Medium fit perfect. It looked nice on, but I ended up going w/another dress.
Not what described, not a good quality

评论概述: Super cute! Wore for my gender reveal.

评论详情: Very cute style and fit ! But the tulle came with all of these random holes and tears! Sad but need it for next day event so I guess I'll be keeping it. For fit I got an XL after reading reviews, not too short or tight around chest or rib cage! Love how it fits. I am 5'5" 155lbs for reference .
I purchased this for a party and was sad to find out it runs small and very uncomfortable. The fabric is way to stiff

Loved the dress but the dress sizes are so limited and girls with big chest can’t really fit. I’m my experience the dress fit me everywhere perfectly but in the chest area. I sadly had to return it since there was no size up to make my chest feel comfortable.
The fabric feels almost like a kids dress up outfit or like a costume. I’m 160 lbs and a DD, ordered a large and the waist was so tight. But the skirt and top were fine. Definitely returning.
I thought this was going to the dress I wore to era’s tour but when it got here it was to tight and the material was so itchy I could not take this dress off faster

I used this dress as part of a cotton candy costume for our school fall festival. I am 140 lbs and 5'1". It fit great and I didn't feel like it was too short for a school function. It was snug in the chest so keep that in mind if you are top heavy.
I love this puffy dress. It fit well and was also very comfortable and looked like the images.
The color was great the material is so cheap it feels like sand paper
I’m like 530 pounds and 4ft 3in and none of the sizes fit me and now I’m devastated
I bought this for my daughter and while zipping it up the zipper fell apart in my hands. Complete detached from the dress as well. The fabric is basically see through. Don't waste your money.

I order a size large came in really fast. This was a second order. I order this same dress from a different seller and it didn’t  come on time. It arrived the day of my event. My pictures were amazing. I’m 5,2 and wear a size 12 it fit perfectly.
Got this for a Halloween costume and it’s exactly what I was looking for. Sadly my D cups wouldn’t fit. Doesn’t work if you have a larger bust.
The dress is cute and I got to use it for a photo but not for actual wearing. Wayy too short, unless you intend for your butt to be out when you bend over or move a little.
Dress looks cheap does not have the volume as the picture and runs extremely  small Swlkwr should be ashamed or discontinue  this dress
This dress looked like a tutu on me and was super itchy! The color was pretty but that was about all I liked about it
This dress looked so pretty online but I wasn’t a fan once I recieved it. Plus it was too short for my liking. I’m 5,2 for reference

评论概述: A Bit Itchy, But Very Cute
评论详情: I got this dress for my teenage daughter and she was so excited about it. It looks very cute, but the ONLY disappointing thing about it is that the inside was itchy. On a scale of one to ten my daughter rated the itchiness a four, so it wasn’t terrible, but it got worse after a while of wearing it.
I wore this to a wedding and got so many compliments- even when I stopped for gas between the ceremony and reception. Better quality than I was anticipating. Fits true to size

I'm used to Selkies. This is simply a cheap wanna-be. Selkies are designed to  look good on everyone. They have soft elastic around the empire waist and sleeves, billowy soft lightweight chiffon, longer hemline to enhance the bustling and make it look aesthically enhancing. The dress fit, I have slender arms and legs, though I gained weight since my surgery. Nevertheless, it's not well made and doesn't drape nicely.

Wore this for the eras tour and it is a great value for the price. If you have a bigger bust, size up from what you normally are. I typically wear a medium if material is stretchy but the top part of this does not have much give!
The stitching on the inside of the dress was rough and scratchy. Very cheap material. I gave it two stars because I got a million compliments wearing the dress.
I wore this dress to the Taylor swift concern! It was great! I ordered an XL. It was a little snug on my chest but overall I was very pleased!! Wore it all night!
When I received this dress it smelt like the worst BO I had ever smelt in my life! I couldn’t even try it on and had to send it back
It’s looks NOTHING like the picture. It looks cheaply made  and it’s see through! Really wanted this for a gender reveal party but this isn’t worth buying!
I am obsessed with this dress! It’s so cute. I’m wearing it to Disney and it’s even cuter in person!
So itchy it was uncomfortable to even try on!
The dress is not what it looks like in the pictures. The material was cheap and weird. It’s literally like a costume
The material feels almost like plastic. The sleeves are especially itchy. It's also more puffy than I wanted.
Cute, colors look like the photo. I purchased a L but fit was a little too big unfortunately.

Hahaha. Laughing is all I can do. I look like a huge cupcake. This is the most unflattering and the most uncomfortable item I’ve ever put on my body. It’s itches everywhere and there’s those thin white elastics that connect the chest to the skirt and tightens the fabric around the arm. I couldn’t take it off fast enough. This isn’t a dress.
